data.lean: lemma example1 (x y z : mynat) : x * y + z = x * y + z :=
data.editorText: refl,

data.lean: lemma example2 (x y : mynat) (h : y = x + 7) : 2 * y = 2 * (x + 7) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma example3 (a b : mynat) (h : succ a = b) : succ(succ(a)) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
rw h, 
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_succ_zero (a : mynat) : a + succ(0) = succ(a) :=
data.editorText:
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_add (n : mynat) : 0 + n = n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
rw add_zero,
refl,

rw add_succ 0 d,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a + b) + c = a + (b + c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
rw ← add_succ,
rw ← add_succ,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_add (a b : mynat) : succ a + b = succ (a + b) :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_comm (a b : mynat) : a + b = b + a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw zero_add,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw succ_add,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_add_one (n : mynat) : succ n = n + 1 :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
induction n with d hd,
rw add_succ,
rw zero_add,
refl,
rw succ_add,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_right_comm (a b c : mynat) : a + b + c = a + c + b :=
data.editorText:
rw add_assoc,
rw add_comm b c,
rw ← add_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_mul (m : mynat) : 0 * m = 0 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw hd,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_one (m : mynat) : m * 1 = m :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_mul (m : mynat) : 1 * m = m :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
induction m with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw hd,
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_add (t a b : mynat) : t * (a + b) = t * a + t * b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_comm,
rw add_comm,
rw hd,
rw add_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a * b) * c = a * (b * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd,
rwa mul_zero,
refl,
repeat {rw mul_succ},
rw mul_add,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_mul (a b : mynat) : succ a * b = a * b + b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rwa mul_zero,
refl,
rwa mul_succ,
rwa add_succ,
rw hd,
rw add_right_comm,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_mul (a b t : mynat) : (a + b) * t = a * t + b * t :=
data.editorText:
induction t with d hd,
repeat {rw mul_zero},
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
simp,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_comm (a b : mynat) : a * b = b * a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
rw zero_mul,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw succ_mul,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_left_comm (a b c : mynat) : a * (b * c) = b * (a * c) :=
data.editorText:
repeat {rw ← mul_assoc},
rw mul_comm a,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_zero : (0 : mynat) ^ (0 : mynat) = 1 :=
data.editorText:
rw pow_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_succ (m : mynat) : (0 : mynat) ^ (succ m) = 0 :=
data.editorText:
--rw pow_succ,
--rw mul_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_one (a : mynat) : a ^ (1 : mynat) = a :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_zero,
rw one_mul,
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_pow (m : mynat) : (1 : mynat) ^ m = 1 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with d hd,
rw pow_zero,
refl,
rw pow_succ,
rw hd,
rw mul_one,
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_add (a m n : mynat) : a ^ (m + n) = a ^ m * a ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
simp,
rw pow_zero,
rw mul_one,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw hd,
rw pow_succ,
rw mul_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_pow (a b n : mynat) : (a * b) ^ n = a ^ n * b ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
rwa pow_zero,
repeat {rw pow_zero},
rw one_mul,
refl,
rw pow_succ,
rw hd,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_succ,
simp,

data.lean: lemma pow_pow (a m n : mynat) : (a ^ m) ^ n = a ^ (m * n) :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
rw pow_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw pow_zero,
refl,
rw pow_succ,
rw hd,
rw mul_succ,
simp,
rw pow_add,
refl,

data.lean:
lemma add_squared (a b : mynat) :
  (a + b) ^ (2 : mynat) = a ^ (2 : mynat) + b ^ (2 : mynat) + 2 * a * b :=
data.editorText:
rw two_eq_succ_one,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
repeat {rw pow_succ},
repeat {rw pow_zero},
repeat {rw one_mul},
repeat {rw mul_add},
repeat {rw add_mul},
repeat {rw succ_mul},
repeat {rw zero_mul},
rw zero_add,
repeat {rw add_mul},
simp,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText: exact h(p),

data.lean: example : mynat → mynat :=
data.editorText:
intro n,
exact 3*n+2,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intros p q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Type) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intros f h p,
apply (f p),
apply h,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q F : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → F) → (P → F)) :=
data.editorText:
intros f h p,
apply h,
apply f,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → empty) → (P → empty)) :=
data.editorText:
intros f h p,
apply h,
apply f,
exact p,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Type)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
apply f15,
apply f11,
apply f9,
apply f8,
apply f5,
apply f2,
apply f1,
exact h,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText: exact h(p),

data.lean: lemma imp_self (P : Prop) : P → P :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
exact p,

data.lean:
lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean:
lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Prop) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intros f h p,
have j : Q → R := f p,
apply j,
apply h,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma imp_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P → Q) → ((Q → R) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intros hpq hqr p,
apply hqr,
apply hpq,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive (P Q : Prop) : (P → Q) → (¬ Q → ¬ P) :=
data.editorText:
repeat {rw not_iff_imp_false},
intros p q,
intro r,
apply q,
apply p,
exact r,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Prop)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText: cc,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (q : Q) : P ∧ Q :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact p,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ P :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p q,
split,
exact q,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma and_trans (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ R → P ∧ R :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p q,
intro i,
split,
exact p,
cases i with q r,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with hpq hqp,
intro i,
split,
intro p,
apply i.1,
apply hpq,
exact p,
intro r,
apply hqp,
apply i.2,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with hpq hqp,
intro i,
split,
intro p,
apply i.1,
apply hpq,
exact p,
intro r,
apply hqp,
apply i.2,
exact r,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : Q → (P ∨ Q) :=
data.editorText:
intro q,
right,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma or_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∨ Q → Q ∨ P :=
data.editorText:
intro h,cases h with p q,
right,
exact p,
left,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_or_distrib_left (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ (Q ∨ R) ↔ (P ∧ Q) ∨ (P ∧ R) :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro h,
cases h with p i,
cases i with q r,
left,
split,
exact p,
exact q,

right,
split,
exact p,
exact r,

intro j,
cases j with k l,
split,
cases k with p q,
exact p,
cases k with p q,
left,
exact q,

cases l with p r,
split,
exact p,
right,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma contra (P Q : Prop) : (P ∧ ¬ P) → Q :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p not_p,
exfalso,
apply not_p,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive2 (P Q : Prop) : (¬ Q → ¬ P) → (P → Q) :=
data.editorText:
by_cases p : P; by_cases q : Q,
repeat {cc},

data.lean: theorem succ_inj' {a b : mynat} (hs : succ(a) = succ(b)) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
have h := succ_inj(hs),
exact h,

data.lean: theorem succ_succ_inj {a b : mynat} (h : succ(succ(a)) = succ(succ(b))) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
have i := succ_inj(h),
have j := succ_inj(i),
exact j,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_of_eq {a b : mynat} : a = b → succ(a) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_iff (a b : mynat) : succ a = succ b ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact succ_inj,
intro h,
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel (a t b : mynat) : a + t = b + t → a = b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
induction t with t i,
rw add_zero at h,
rw add_zero at h,
exact h,

rw add_succ a at h,
rw add_succ b at h,
have j := succ_inj(h),
have k := i(j),
exact k,

data.lean: theorem add_left_cancel (t a b : mynat) : t + a = t + b → a = b :=
data.editorText:
rw add_comm t a,
rw add_comm t b,
exact add_right_cancel a t b,

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel_iff (t a b : mynat) :  a + t = b + t ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact add_right_cancel _ _ _,
intro h,
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self {a b : mynat} : a + b = a → b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rw ← add_zero a at h,
rw add_assoc a 0 b at h,
rw zero_add b at h,
rw add_left_cancel a b 0,
refl,
apply h,

data.lean: theorem succ_ne_zero (a : mynat) : succ a ≠ 0 :=
data.editorText:
symmetry,
exact zero_ne_succ a,

data.lean: lemma add_left_eq_zero {{a b : mynat}} (H : a + b = 0) : b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases b with d,
refl,
rw add_succ a d at H,
exfalso,
have h := succ_ne_zero (a + d),
have i := h(H),
exact i,

data.lean: lemma add_right_eq_zero {a b : mynat} : a + b = 0 → a = 0 :=
data.editorText:
rw add_comm a b,
intro h,
have i := add_left_eq_zero(h),
exact i,

data.lean: theorem add_one_eq_succ (d : mynat) : d + 1 = succ d :=
data.editorText:
symmetry,
exact succ_eq_add_one d,

data.lean: lemma ne_succ_self (n : mynat) : n ≠ succ n :=
data.editorText:
cases n with h,
exact zero_ne_succ 0,
intro i,
have j := succ_inj(i),
symmetry at j,
rw succ_eq_add_one at j,
have k := eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self(j),
rw one_eq_succ_zero at k,
apply succ_ne_zero 0,
exact k,

data.lean: theorem mul_pos (a b : mynat) : a ≠ 0 → b ≠ 0 → a * b ≠ 0 :=
data.editorText:
intros h i j,
cases b with n,
rw mul_zero a at j,
have k := i(j),
exact k,
rw mul_succ a n at j,
have k := add_left_eq_zero(j),
have l := h(k),
exact l,

data.lean:
theorem eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero (a b : mynat) (h : a * b = 0) :
  a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases b with n,
rw mul_zero a at h,
right,
refl,
rw mul_succ a n at h,
have i := add_left_eq_zero(h),
left,
exact i,

data.lean: theorem mul_eq_zero_iff (a b : mynat): a * b = 0 ↔ a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro h,
apply eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero,
exact h,
intro i,
cases i with a b,
rw a,
rw zero_mul,
refl,
rw b,
rw mul_zero,
refl,

data.lean: theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : mynat) (ha : a ≠ 0) : a * b = a * c → b = c :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd generalizing b,
rw mul_zero a,
intro h,
rw mul_eq_zero_iff at h,
cases h with a b,
exfalso,
exact ha(a),
exact b,
intro i,
cases b with n,
rw mul_zero at i,
symmetry at i,
rw mul_eq_zero_iff a (succ d) at i,
cases i,
exfalso,
exact ha(i),
symmetry,
exact i,
apply succ_eq_succ_of_eq,
rw mul_succ a n at i,
rw mul_succ a d at i,
rw add_right_cancel_iff at i,
have j := hd(n),
exact j(i),

data.lean: lemma one_add_le_self (x : mynat) : x ≤ 1 + x :=
data.editorText:
--rw le_iff_exists_add,
use 1,
exact add_comm 1 x,

data.lean: lemma le_refl (x : mynat) : x ≤ x :=
data.editorText:
use 0,
refl,

data.lean: theorem le_succ (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b → a ≤ (succ b) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
  rw le_iff_exists_add at h ⊢,
  cases h with c hc,
  rw hc,
  use succ c,
  rw add_succ,
  refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_le (a : mynat) : 0 ≤ a :=
data.editorText:
use a,
rw zero_add,
refl,

data.lean: theorem le_trans (a b c : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hbc : b ≤ c) : a ≤ c :=
data.editorText:
cases hab with h i,
cases hbc with j k,
rw k,
rw i,
use (h + j),
--simp,
rw add_assoc a h j,
refl,

data.lean: theorem le_antisymm (a b : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hba : b ≤ a) : a = b :=
data.editorText:
cases hab with h i,
cases hba with j k,
rw k at i,
symmetry at i,
rw add_assoc b j h at i,
have l := eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self i,
have m := add_right_eq_zero l,
rw m at k,
rw add_zero b at k,
exact k,

data.lean: lemma le_zero (a : mynat) (h : a ≤ 0) : a = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases h with i h,
symmetry at h,
have j := add_right_eq_zero h,
exact j,

data.lean: lemma succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) (h : a ≤ b) : succ a ≤ succ b :=
data.editorText:
cases h with i h,
rw h,
use i,
rw succ_add a i,
refl,

data.lean: theorem le_total (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∨ b ≤ a :=
data.editorText:
revert a,
induction b with h i,
intro a,
right,
exact zero_le a,
intro a,
cases a with j k,
left,
exact zero_le (succ h),
cases i j,
left,
apply succ_le_succ j h,
exact h_1,
right,
apply succ_le_succ h j,
exact h_1,

data.lean: lemma le_succ_self (a : mynat) : a ≤ succ a :=
data.editorText:
apply le_succ,
refl,

data.lean: theorem add_le_add_right {a b : mynat} : a ≤ b → ∀ t, (a + t) ≤ (b + t) :=
data.editorText:
intro t,
intro h,
cases t with i t,
--rw add_zero a,
--rw add_zero b,
--exact t,
use i,
rw t,
rw add_right_comm a i h,
refl,

data.lean: theorem le_of_succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ succ b → a ≤ b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with i h,
rw succ_add a i at h,
have j := succ_inj(h),
use i,
exact j,

data.lean: theorem not_succ_le_self (a : mynat) : ¬ (succ a ≤ a) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
induction a with i j,
have k := le_zero(succ 0) h,
apply succ_ne_zero 0,
exact k,
apply j,
apply le_of_succ_le_succ (succ i) i,
exact h,

data.lean:
theorem add_le_add_left {a b : mynat} (h : a ≤ b) (t : mynat) :
  t + a ≤ t + b :=
data.editorText:
induction t with i h,
rw zero_add a,
rw zero_add b,
exact h,
rw succ_add i a,
rw succ_add i b,
apply succ_le_succ,
exact h,

data.lean: lemma lt_aux_one (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) → succ a ≤ b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with i j,
cases i with k l,
cases k with m n,
exfalso,
rw add_zero at l,
apply j,
use 0,
rw add_zero,
symmetry,
exact l,
use m,
rw succ_add a m,
rw l,
rw add_succ a m,
refl,

data.lean: lemma lt_aux_two (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ b → a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: lemma lt_iff_succ_le (a b : mynat) : a < b ↔ succ a ≤ b :=
data.editorText: sorry
